headline: The Best Warren Buffett Stocks to Buy With $1,000 Right Now
summary: You may want to peruse Warren Buffett's portfolio for ideas.  After all, Buffett and his investing colleagues Todd Combs and Ted Wechsler at Berkshire Hathaway (NYSE: BRK.A) (NYSE: BRK.B) only seek out competitively advantaged, cash-producing companies that trade at reasonable valuations.  Berkshire bought Amazon in the first quarter of 2019, a good time in general to buy tech stocks, and it's had a great run, nearly tripling since then.
